name: Forg
description:
Really enjoyed the #LowResJam .  I ran out of time but this is at least coherent enough: Here is  a score attack game where you eat flies,  dash and power up to shoot fireballs.   Probably put about 24 hours in.  Being restricted to 64X64 pixels is pretty interesting. I added the extra restriction of making a one screen game.        

WASD to move, Space = eat/shoot, Shift to dash
